Module FantasyRealmsTM
Package client

Class SceneNavigator

java.lang.Object
client.SceneNavigator
public class SceneNavigator
extends java.lang.Object
Utility class for controlling navigation between vistas. All methods on the navigator are static to facilitate simple access from anywhere in the application. Taken with the consent of the author from the web page on github: https://gist.github.com/jewelsea/6460130
Author:
jewelsea
See Also:
https://gist.github.com/jewelsea/6460130

  • Method Details

    • setMainController

      static void setMainController​(MainController mainController)
      Stores the main controller for later use in navigation tasks.
      Parameters:
      mainController - the main application layout controller.

    • loadVista

      static void loadVista​(java.lang.String fxml)
      Loads the vista specified by the fxml file into the vistaHolder pane of the main application layout. Previously loaded vista for the same fxml file are not cached. The fxml is loaded anew and a new vista node hierarchy generated every time this method is invoked. A more sophisticated load function could potentially add some enhancements or optimizations, for example: cache FXMLLoaders cache loaded vista nodes, so they can be recalled or reused allow a user to specify vista node reuse or new creation allow back and forward history like a browser
      Parameters:
      fxml - the fxml file to be loaded.

    • getLocaleFromConfig

      private static java.util.Locale getLocaleFromConfig()
      Gets the locale for displaying the UI texts in the appropriate language.
      Returns:
      Locale for the desired language.
